pr_title: Use property to control build cache push instead of CI env variable s…

timeline.message: Use property to control build cache push instead of CI env variable since many builds have that set.

timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: This is settings.gradle so there's no project here. But I changed to check env instead which I think is closer to what you had in mind in our chat conversation
replies.author: anuraaga
